title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series - Ep. 12 "Die Hard"
description:
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!

Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] kind of funny Goes to School they've got their crew they are so cool looking out for each other except for Kevin S dude this game over craigy the prde of Long Island producer Seducer and that pure want to there's nothing they can do together now oh the kind of funny crew yeah this nothing they can do yo it's your boy Tim Gettys they say life's pretty hard but not when you're Tim Gettys me I'm crushing it I'm crushing it I'm crushing it he's crushing it I'm crushing it that's right I'm crushing it keep crushing it I'm crushing it you ain't crushing it I'm crushing it that's right I'm crushing it cut this is not working Kevin I need more feeling from your eyes should I take off my sunglasses absolutely not Cisco more energy you're supposed to be the dragon I'm looking for smog not Puff the Magic Pence you call that a pure wet where did you go to ballet school I've seen better extension on Greg's shitty dog when he's sleeping everybody take five I don't have to stand for this I've

the Magic Pence you call that a pure wet where did you go to ballet school I've seen better extension on Greg's shitty dog when he's sleeping everybody take five I don't have to stand for this I've got way better places to be I don't wow Nick's really in his element it's great to see your friends find their stride yeah must have been how Stalin felt when Hitler invaded Poland can I help you gentlemen I would like a hamburger no onions no mustard no ketchup no pickles no lettuce add extra mayo right away sir wait a minute don't I know you from somewhere oh uh I I have a very common face did you used to drive the Zamboni at the City Ice Pavilion no I did not oh I get it you don't want to get mobbed your secret is safe with me yo this music video was a brilliant idea now that Wendy's witnessed my talent firsthand she'll have no choice but to go out with me nobody can resist my lyrical genius I'm going to make my move how'd that go they looked at my crot laughed well at least she's

my talent firsthand she'll have no choice but to go out with me nobody can resist my lyrical genius I'm going to make my move how'd that go they looked at my crot laughed well at least she's thinking about it yes I can hear you Chico I'm sorry it's stuffy down there because I can't risk any of the kids seeing you and blowing the surprise if you get what I mean no I didn't mean to like that I like blowing up come on get your mind out of the gutter because you're wearing a vest packed with enough C4 to level this entire School hence blowing Jesus it's not that hard to understand um I assume you heard that so are you going to be cool about this or guess not all right nobody move or the monkey will blow this place Sky High oh no is he serious aren't you perfect to die I'll make this very simple you but ball I'm head over heels in love with you can't help it in the past I've tried to kidnap you in an attempt to win you over but my friend Chico here has convinced me that a good relationship

you but ball I'm head over heels in love with you can't help it in the past I've tried to kidnap you in an attempt to win you over but my friend Chico here has convinced me that a good relationship has to be based on trust and you can't really trust someone who just tied you up and threw you into the back of his molestation van you follow me here so far so good so instead of taking that route I'm going to leave the decision to you the bomb strapped to Chico's chest will go off in exactly 1 hour unless you commit to me fully with all of your heart soul and roly poly body well that all sounds great damn it Greg can't you see that the Zamboni driver is holding us hostage you sir are a disgrace to your profession guys I have a plan ah damn it my fault all right I forgot to mention the dead man switch which Chico holds in his hand the little ethnic girl that just ran out gets a freebie anyone else makes a move for the door and Chico will blow you all to Smither don't provoke him everybody

switch which Chico holds in his hand the little ethnic girl that just ran out gets a freebie anyone else makes a move for the door and Chico will blow you all to Smither don't provoke him everybody that monkey looks like he might have an explosive temper I hope he doesn't blow his top dinomite God damn it Barb [Music]
